name: Banshee Blast
savingThrow: Reflex half and Will negates (see text)
text: You create a cone of spectral energy resembling screaming elven ghosts that deals 1d4 points of damage per caster level (maximum 15d4); a successful Reflex save halves this damage. Any creature that fails its Reflex save must succeed at a Will save or become panicked for 1 round/level.
duration_zh: 立即 和 1轮/等级; 见文本
savingThrow_zh: 反射, 通过则减半 和 意志, 通过则无效; 见文本
text_zh: 你创造出一股幽能来模仿精灵鬼魂的尖啸，这会在成每施法者等级1d4点伤害（最高15d4）; 成功的反射豁免能够使伤害减半。任何在反射豁免中失败的生物必须进行意志豁免，失败则会恐慌（panicked），持续时间为每等级1轮。
